apple_vendor_description: The mermaid with medium-dark skin tone on Apple devices is a captivating figure, her iridescent tail shimmering with a spectrum of blues and greens under Apple's expert lighting. Her form is sculpted with smooth gradients and soft rounded edges, giving her an ethereal, almost magical quality. This enchanting emoji, as seen on Apple devices, embodies fantasy, mystery, and the allure of the ocean, often used to express dreams, wonder, or a touch of whimsy.
